EmailTemplate.name: MMScriptClientApprovalNotification
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Script {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.Name} is approved by Client
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.OwnerFirstName},
the script {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.Name} is approved by Client.
Sincerely, ADvendio Team
